wrtsrc.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002                                                                            
00003   WriteSource:  Writes the text of a PDS label to a file with line numbers.
00004 
00005   Input:
00006          source_file  - Pointer to the file descriptor for the source file
00007                         containing the label to be printed.
00008          output_file  - Pointer to the file descriptor for the output file.
00009 
00010   Output:  No function value is returned.  The text of the label with
00011            line numbers is written using output routine ODLWriteStmt.
00012 
00013   Author:  Randy Davis, University of Colorado LASP
00014 
00015   Creation Date: 18 May 1991
00016 
00017   History:
00018 
00019   Creation - This routine was introduced in Version 2.1 of the ODLC library.
00020 
00021   Version 2.2 - 18 May 1991 - M. DeMore, Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00022     a) Removed include statements that were Unix specific and placed them
00023        in odldef.h. Removed prototypes of ODL functions and added include
00024        file odlinter.h.
00025     b) Corrected argument declarations from FILE to FILE *.
00026 
00027   Version 2.3 - 6 February 1991 - M. DeMore, Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00028     a) Changed line number count to long int for PC.
00029  ****************************************************************************/
00030 
00031 #include "odldef.h"
00032 #include "odlinter.h"
00033 
00034 /* The following define the maximum number of characters in a source line,
00035    the width of the line number, and the maximum length of an output line */
00036 
00037 #define  MAXSRCLINE 132
00038 #define  LINOWIDTH  5
00039 #define  MAXOUTLINE MAXSRCLINE+LINOWIDTH+1
00040 
00041 
00042 void WriteSource (
00043 
00044 /* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> BEGIN CN CHANGES >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> */
00045 /* >>>>> MDD 4/30/91  Changed FILE to FILE *                       >>>>> */
00046 /* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> */
00047 
00048        FILE  *source_file,
00049        FILE  *output_file)
00050 
00051 /* >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> END OF CN CHANGES >>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> */
00052 {
00053   char  src_line[MAXSRCLINE]; /* Buffer to hold input line of the label   */
00054   char  out_line[MAXOUTLINE]; /* Buffer to hold output line               */
00055   long   line_no;              /* Line number                              */
00056 
00057   line_no = 0;
00058 
00059   while (fgets (src_line, MAXSRCLINE, source_file) != NULL)
00060     {
00061       /* Increment the line number, convert it to a character string
00062      representation and place in line buffer */
00063 
00064       line_no++;
00065       sprintf (out_line, "%0*ld %s", LINOWIDTH, line_no, src_line);
00066       ODLWriteStmt (output_file, out_line);
00067 
00068       /* See if we have hit the END statement yet and if so, stop
00069          processing */
00070 
00071       if (strcmp (src_line, "END\n") == 0)
00072         {
00073           break;
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077   return;
00078 }
